titleInfo.title: Images From the World Between: Circus in 20th Century American Art exhibition

mods.abstract: Two color half-sheet (black and red on white) announcing Images From the World Between: the circus in 20th Century American Art exhibition at the John and Mable Ringling Museum of Art on display on February 2 - May 12. Poster features a metal photoplate of an elephant circus act from a photo taken by Robert Riggs (1986-1950).

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
